data.message:
你上一次仰望星空是在多久之前？閃爍的星辰令你想起甚麼？
When did you last look upon the twinkling stars? Where did they lead you in your imagination?
 
《向星辰傾訴》這首牧歌中，孤獨的主人翁在星光中看見愛慕對象的身影，沉醉的他彷彿離開了物象世界的藩籬。你有否好奇，作曲家蒙台威爾第是怎樣將寂寞的愁緒和愛情的夢幻兩種截然不同的感覺共冶一爐呢？
In the madrigal “Sfogava con le stelle”, the love-sick man sees his idol in the starlight. Dazed by the image, he seems to leave the sorrow in the objective world. Are you curious about how the composer Monteverdi mixed the two contrasting moods, solitude and fantasy in love, together into one song?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HwYEHF35Q70
===
蒙台威爾第 牧歌音樂會 
i sentimenti di Monteverdi
1 Jan 2017 . Sun . 8pm
西灣河文娛中心劇院
Theatre, Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre
http://www.urbtix.hk/internet/eventDetail/31177
